rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 5 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 3:22 PM, 12 July 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Metro Manila, Rizal, Batangas and Cavite within the next 2 hours.



Intense to torrential rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Tarlac(San Clemente, Camiling, Capas, San Jose, Tarlac City, Concepcion, La Paz), Nueva Ecija(Zaragoza, San Antonio, Cabiao, San Isidro), Bulacan(San Miguel, Norzagaray, Dona Remedios Trinidad, San Jose del Monte), Pampanga(Candaba, Arayat, Magalang), Zambales(Olongapo, Subic, Castillejos), Bataan(Orani, Samal, Abucay, Balanga, Orion, Pilar), Laguna(Cabuyao, Calamba) and Quezon(Lucban, Tayabas, Sampaloc) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
